   # how to set map dir other than default fixed ones?
      * do soft link
   # how to add new maps?
      * see $HOME/.omgps/config_VERSION/map.py, NOTE: map must be of type "Spherical Mercator Map", like OSM.
   # how to clear the status text at bottom of main view?
      * click it
   # ho to change zoom level quickly
      * for example, from 17 to 10: press and hold button "+", you will see zoom level decreases every ~300 ms. release button when expected zoom level reaches.
